A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm not sure why so many people seem to hate this movie.  Is some of the humor a little cringey yes. Is most of the Fin side plot unnecessary yes\, but other than feeling entitled about or misunderstanding Star Wars there isn't much to complain about. This movie is good. It's original and takes risks. It's refreshing to see the Kurosawa influences back. Overall lots of fun\, heart\, and action\, and all of that is what makes Star Wars not nostalgia and fan service.
